viewProductoDisponible: select ip.* from ( SELECT i."CodEmpresa", i."Empresa", i."CodSede", i."Sede", i."CodAlmacen", i."Almacen", i."ProductoId" , SUM(i."Factor" * i."Cantidad") as "CantidadDisponible" FROM logistica.inventario i where i."EstadoId" = 1 and i."CodEstadoInventario" = 1 group by i."CodEmpresa", i."Empresa", i."CodSede", i."Sede", i."CodAlmacen", i."Almacen", i."ProductoId" ) ip
